targetLine.text: Oh-ho, so go ahead! But think about this, Lorraine! Who's gonna pay for all your clothes, huh? And your jewelry, and your liquor? Who's gonna pay for your cosmetic surgery, Lorraine?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: Damn it, Biff! That's it. I'm leaving!

contextAfter.text: You were the one who wanted me to get these--these... things! If you want 'em back, you can have 'em.
Look, Lorraine. You walk out that door, and I won't only cut off you, I'll cut off your kids!

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
